ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Subscription_Type__c, "One-time"), Number_Of_Hold_Books__c > 0), AND( ISPICKVAL(Subscription_Type__c, "VIP"), Number_Of_Hold_Books__c > 15), AND( ISPICKVAL(Subscription_Type__c, "Month"), Number_Of_Hold_Books__c > 5), AND( ISPICKVAL(Subscription_Type__c, "Year"), Number_Of_Hold_Books__c > 5) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reader with "one-time" subscription can take 0 books home, with "month" and "year" - max 5 books and with "VIP" - max 15 books.
